about_the_game:
Enkate is an action rpg rogue like where death is final.
Only wings persist after death, rare and precious items which improve as the player progresses.
3 playable classes :
- Savage : tank/support
- Mercenary : dps
- Veterinary heal /support
It is necessary to compose balanced teams to defeat the most terrible enemies, and to equip yourself with the best objects found on enemies,
or crafted with resources.

story
Writings handed down for several generations recount the event that radically changed the organization of human society on Earth, destroying its structure and breaking it up into hundreds of thousands of “lands” floating like a cloudy star in space.

The earth would have been the battleground of several extra-terrestrial people, and armed with extremely powerful technology, their clashes would have reduced the planet to a heap of floating debris.

We don't know for certain how much time has passed since the ultra-bang, given the little temporal indication since the disorganization of the solar system. Days and nights follow each other chaotically in a world where the calendar and the seasons no longer exist. High engineers still estimate that we are currently between 2269 and 2286.

On Enkate, the last human institutions organize themselves to ensure their survival. The only hope is the reappropriation of the different lands floating in the form of piles of residues in the universe to exploit the resources still present there. The Enkatonian high engineers have developed a process to open a portal to these different lands, where soldiers are transported in order to acquire information and establish a lasting colony if possible. The portal must nevertheless be set up by a team of explorers to allow the teleportation of the rest of the soldiers, but its lifespan cannot exceed thirty minutes.

name: Enkate

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8 Series 2 GB+
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9 Series 4 GB+

short_description: An action-rpg multiplayer with rogue-like influences, in a post-apocalyptic world.
